title: Self-Paced Learning:
benefits: Unlimited access to all self-paced courses
Access to all course content without any time restrictions
Participation in discussion forums or peer groups to enhance learning
Automated assessments and feedback to track progress

title: Hybrid Learning:
benefits: Access to course materials, group sessions, and forums
Flexible learning with both self-paced and live group elements

type: Premium pricing with pay-as-you-go or package options.
title: 1:1 Coaching:
benefits: Personalized one-on-one sessions for tailored guidance
Access to self-paced content in addition to coaching sessions
Premium support to provide more in-depth help and advice
